trans-unit.source: Specifies that this property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指定此属性可以与属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性进行组合。

trans-unit.source: Properties that are marked with the MergablePropertyAttribute set to `true` can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MergablePropertyAttribute 标记的属性设置为`true`可以与属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性组合。

trans-unit.source: Properties that are marked with the MergablePropertyAttribute set to `false` must be displayed separately.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MergablePropertyAttribute 标记的属性设置为`false`必须单独显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you mark a property with the MergablePropertyAttribute set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 标记与 MergablePropertyAttribute 属性时将设置为`true`，此属性的值设置为常量成员<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes>

trans-unit.source: For a property marked with the MergablePropertyAttribute property set to `false`, the value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No>.
trans-unit.target: 对于属性标记 MergablePropertyAttribute 属性设置为`false`，值为<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你想要检查你的代码中的该属性的值，你必须指定该属性为<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.No?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此属性可以与属于一个属性窗口中; 中的其他对象的属性组合否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以与属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性组合此属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此属性可以与属于一个属性窗口中; 中的其他对象的属性组合否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value, which is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes"></xref>, that is a property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指定默认值，该值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute.Yes"> </xref>，该属性可以与属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性组合。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with this value, this attribute is set to the constant member <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 当具有此值的属性标记时，将此属性设置为常量成员<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你想要检查是否将该属性设置为你的代码中的此值，你必须指定该属性作为<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指示此实例与指定的对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Another object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 等于此实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前的哈希代码<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if this attribute is the default.
trans-unit.target: 确定此属性是否为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute is the default value for this attribute class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果属性是为该属性类; 默认值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property cannot be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个属性不能组合与属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute> set to `false`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member No.
trans-unit.target: 标记与某个属性时<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>设置为`false`，此属性的值设置为常量成员否。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as No.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你想要检查是否将该属性设置为你的代码中的此值，你必须指定该属性作为否。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a property can be combined with properties belonging to other objects in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个属性可以结合属于属性窗口中的其他对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>字段是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This field is the default setting for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为此属性的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: When you mark a property with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute> set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member Yes.
trans-unit.target: 标记与某个属性时<xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>设置为`true`，此属性的值设置为常量的成员是。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MergablePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you want to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as Yes.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你想要检查是否将该属性设置为你的代码中的此值，则你必须为是指定属性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
